mapper.insert: insert into operationlog(id, uid, postId, type, createTime) values (null, #{userId}, #{postId}, #{type}, current_timestamp );
mapper.select: select * from (select * from operationlog where uid = #{uid}) as o natural join (select id as postId, title, uid as userid, summary, likeNum, viewNum, collectionNum from posts) as p natural join (select id as userid, name from users) as u order by createTime desc limit #{from}, #{to};
